skills.title: Front-end
skills.description: Experienced front-end developer skilled in crafting engaging user interfaces and seamless user experiences. Proficient in HTML, CSS, Javascript, and responsive design principles, with a passion for creating visually stunning websites and web applications.

skills.title: Back-end
skills.description: Seasoned back-end developer proficient in building robust server-side applications and APIs. Expertise in programming languages such as Python Java, and Node.js, coupled with a deep understanding of databases and server management. Committed to delivering efficient and scalable solutions to meet the needs of modern web development.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: web flow developer proficient in leveraging cutting-edge technologies to create fluid and interactive web experiences.

skills.title: Data Analyst/Scientist
skills.description: Skilled data scientits skilled in extracting actionable insights from complex datasets. Proficient in machine learning algorithms, statisrical analysis, and data visualization techniques, with a track record of solving real world problems.
